heading: HB08376
0: AN ACT DECLARING SEPTEMBER 10 OF EVERY YEAR AS THE FOUNDING ANNIVERSARY OF THE CITYHOOD OF  SAN JOSE DEL MONTE, CELEBRATED THROUGH THE TANGLAWAN FESTIVAL, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 9750 ENTITLED: AN ACT DECLARING SEPTEMBER 10 OF EVERY YEAR A SPECIAL NONWORKING HOLIDAY IN THE CITY OF SAN JOSE DEL MONTE, PROVINCE OF BULACAN TO BE KNOWN AS THE 'FOUNDATION DAY OF THE CITY OF SAN JOSE DEL MONTE' "
